summary: Add new follower name "Terra" to the game inspired by dremora of coldharbour from Elder Scroll Online
descriptionHtml:
[center]TERRA THE DREMORA FOLLOWER

Add new follower name "Terra" to the game inspired by dremora of coldharbour from Elder Scroll Online
her base level are 15,One handed warrior class Dremora

Name : Terra

Class : Dremora Melee

Armor : Daedric Armor

Weapon : Mace of molag bal

Body : CBBE (Redone Version)

Perks : One Handed Perks

Location :
Abandoned house in markarth

Required :
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm (1.9 or Latest)

Installation :

NMM or copy to data folder

Uninstall :

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

Recommended :
Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019

Credit :
BETHESDA
True Eyes By JimtownIrish
Kijiko Hair by Kijiko and Goldiocks
Mature skin texture and body by [b]Maevan2[/b]
The Astaroth Suit Armor By NPR
Glorious Daedric Retexture by [b]Gloriouz[/b][/center]
author: Fachry
